snippet.title: Mantis Burn Racing® Official Launch Trailer OUT NOW - [EN PEGI]
snippet.description: The race is on in Mantis Burn Racing® one of the most visually stunning and in-depth top-down racing games ever made - Real-world ‘fun’ physics combine with intuitive controls and fast-paced racing, with highly competitive 4-player split-screen races and online modes for up to 8 players and an in-depth RPG-style vehicle upgrade system. Out Now on PlayStation®4, Xbox One and Steam® (for Windows PC). http://bit.ly/2aS4fu4
